name: Tavern Brawl - Tactics
description:
"Every battle takes only a few minutes. I can play it anytime."
"Haven't played such a great TBS game for a while."
"Has extreme potential, very promising."
Love turn-based strategy games but don't have much time playing? Try Tavern Brawl - Tactics! It's easy to handle and very charming! #Less Time More Fun#
Build up your own extraordinary team with classical heroic roles. Experience fast-paced battles with plenty of actions and strategic gameplay!

FEATURES:
▸Turn-based passionate battles with innovative interactions and strategic gameplay
▸Activate many unique heroes to master all kinds of powerful skills and abilities
▸Hexagon tactical gaming board allows creation of massive possibilities
▸Customize your team with tons of skill combinations
▸Explore various of ways and find the best one to layout teamwork
▸Encounter different opponents from all over the world in real-time battle
▸Fast-paced game on mobile device allows you to conquer whenever and wherever
▸Share your ideas and experiences with other players for more

EXPECTABLE CONSTANT UPDATES
- New heroes and features
- Exciting events
- Regular updates and adjustments based on your feedback and suggestions
